attributes.action: End the vat on heating fuel
attributes.additional_details:
This tax was imposed by the EU, we are now no longer part of the EU, therefore the tax should be scrapped.
Heating and hot water are not luxuries, they are basic necessities.
Boris Johnson used this tax to highlight the benefits of leaving the EU, so it should have been scrapped when we left.
attributes.background: The government should remove the vat on heating fuel.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Remove VAT from all domestic fuel, and provide price capping on heating oil: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598647

Cut the VAT charged on energy bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597470

Cut VAT on domestic electricity to zero: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594293
